thread.title: Lebanon looks to boost downtown activity
thread.title_full: Lebanon looks to boost downtown activity - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Lebanon looks to boost downtown activity
text:
LEBANON, N.H. (AP) - Officials in Lebanon are trying to make the city's downtown a desirable destination.
The Valley News reports ( http://bit.ly/1L1vmxo ) city councilors shared ideas to change the face of the city's downtown during a work session Wednesday.
The discussions were spurred by last year's discovery of the dilapidated state of a tunnel beneath a city parking lot and the pedestrian mall. City officials and consultants from Vanasse Hangen Brustlin are seeking input on a plan that could alter the look of the downtown area.
Ideas shared included establishing an area heating district, altering traffic patterns to allow for two-way traffic around a city park and building a skate park.
Information from: Lebanon Valley News, http://www.vnews.com
